name: Banana Walnut Muffins
ingredients: 1 cup granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda

instructions.en: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). Line a 6-cup muffin tin with paper liners. Optionally, spray liners with cooking spray.
instructions.sk: Predhrejte rúru na 175°C. Vyložte 6-jamkovú formu na muffiny papierovými košíčkami. Voliteľne postriekajte košíčky kuchynským sprejom.
instructions.ja: オーブンを350°F（175°C）に予熱します。6個のマフィン型に紙カップを敷きます。必要に応じて、紙カップにクッキングスプレーを吹きかけます。

instructions.en: In a small bowl, stir together almond flour, flax meal, baking powder, salt, chopped walnuts, and granular Splenda (if using).
instructions.sk: V malej miske zmiešajte mandľovú múku, ľanové semienka, prášok do pečiva, soľ, nasekané orechy a granulovanú Splendu (ak používate).
instructions.ja: 小さなボウルにアーモンドフラワー、フラックスミール、ベーキングパウダー、塩、刻んだクルミ、粒状のスプレンダ（使用する場合）を入れて混ぜます。

instructions.en: In a medium microwave-safe bowl, melt the butter in the microwave.
instructions.sk: V stredne veľkej miske vhodnej do mikrovlnnej rúry roztopte maslo.
instructions.ja: 電子レンジ対応の中サイズのボウルにバターを入れ、電子レンジで溶かします。

instructions.en: Stir liquid Splenda (if using), banana extract, caramel extract, vanilla, cream, and water into the melted butter.
instructions.sk: Do roztopeného masla vmiešajte tekutú Splendu (ak používate), banánový extrakt, karamelový extrakt, vanilku, smotanu a vodu.
instructions.ja: 溶かしたバターに液体スプレンダ（使用する場合）、バナナエキス、キャラメルエキス、バニラ、クリーム、水を加えて混ぜます。

instructions.en: Add the dry ingredients and eggs to the butter mixture; stir with a wooden spoon until well blended.
instructions.sk: Pridajte suché prísady a vajcia do maslovej zmesi; miešajte drevenou lyžicou, kým sa dobre nespoja.
instructions.ja: バターの混合物に乾燥材料と卵を加え、木のスプーンでよく混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Fill the 6 paper-lined muffin cups evenly with the batter.
instructions.sk: Naplňte 6 papierových košíčkov na muffiny rovnomerne cestom.
instructions.ja: 6個の紙カップに生地を均等に分け入れます。

instructions.en: Bake for 15-20 minutes, until the tops are golden brown.
instructions.sk: Pečte 15-20 minút, kým vrch nezhnedne do zlatista.
instructions.ja: 15〜20分間、または表面がきつね色になるまで焼きます。

instructions.en: Serve warm or at room temperature. Store in the refrigerator. Serve with butter or Cream Cheese Spread.
instructions.sk: Podávajte teplé alebo pri izbovej teplote. Skladujte v chladničke. Podávajte s maslom alebo krémovým syrovým nátierkom.
instructions.ja: 温かいうちに、または室温で提供します。冷蔵庫で保存してください。バターまたはクリームチーズスプレッドと一緒に提供します。

notes: These Banana Walnut Muffins are a low-carb version of the classic flavor combination. They use almond flour and flax meal instead of wheat flour, making them suitable for a ketogenic diet. The banana flavor comes from extract rather than actual bananas, keeping the carb count low. The addition of walnuts provides a nice crunch and healthy fats. These muffins can be served warm or at room temperature, but should be stored in the refrigerator for longer shelf life. They pair well with butter or a cream cheese spread.
